    • Method Detail

      • checkCollisionWithDoor

        public static int checkCollisionWithDoor(Molecule mol1,
                                         sim.util.Double3D desiredLoc,
                                         Door door,
                                         CellSimulator3D_Model parent)
        Detects the area to which a molecule collides with a door.
        Parameters:
        mol1 - the molecule to check collision
        desiredLoc - the desired location to check collision
        door - the door to check collision
        parent - the cell simulator model
        Returns:
        0 = collision whit exterior door radius of action , 1 = molecule is inside door, 2 = molecule have a collision with the walls of door ,3 = collsion with interior door radius of action

      • findCurrentZone

        public static void findCurrentZone(Molecule mol,
                                   java.util.TreeMap<java.lang.Integer,Layer> layersMap)
        Find the position where is a molecule. Also updates the zone in the molecule and adapt its speed the layer.
        Parameters:
        mol - the molecule to update
        layersMap - the map whit the ID of the layers and the layer agent

      • reboundWithLayer

        public static boolean reboundWithLayer(Molecule mol,
                                       int zone,
                                       int toGo)
        Rebound logic applies to a molecule if it can not access to the zone where it is directed or update the speed of the molecule to the zone layer if it can access
        Parameters:
        mol - the molecule to check
        zone - the layer id to resolve the rebound logic
        toGo - the direction of molecule if it goes outside to inside then the value is 1 or -1 if it goes inside to outside
        Returns:
        true, if the molecule can access to the zone

      • insideBoard

        public static boolean insideBoard(Molecule mol,
                                  CellSimulator3D_Model parent)
        Method to validate if a molecule position is inside the board.
        Parameters:
        mol - the molecule to check collision
        parent - the cell simulator model
        Returns:
        true, if molecule is inside the board.

      • checkCollisionBetweenSpheres

        public static boolean checkCollisionBetweenSpheres(double r1,
                                                   sim.util.Double3D loc,
                                                   double r2,
                                                   sim.util.Double3D anotherLocation)
        Method to detect collisions between two molecules positions.
        Parameters:
        r1 - the radius of sphere one
        loc - the position of sphere one
        r2 - the radius of sphere two
        anotherLocation - the position of sphere two
        Returns:
        true, if exist collision

      • checkMoleculeInsideLayer

        public static boolean checkMoleculeInsideLayer(Agent molecule,
                                               sim.util.Double3D desiredLoc,
                                               Layer layer,
                                               sim.util.Double3D layerCenter)
        Check molecule is inside one layer.
        Parameters:
        molecule - the molecule to check collision
        desiredLoc - the molecule desired location to check collision
        layer - the layer to check
        layerCenter - the layer center location
        Returns:
        true, if molecule is inside layer

      • checkCollisionWithLayer

        public static int checkCollisionWithLayer(Molecule mol1,
                                          sim.util.Double3D desiredLoc,
                                          Layer layer,
                                          sim.util.Double3D layerCenter,
                                          CellSimulator3D_Model parent)
        Check molecule collides with one layer.
        Parameters:
        mol1 - the molecule to check collision
        desiredLoc - the molecule desired location to check collision
        layer - the layer to check collision
        layerCenter - the layer center location
        parent - the cell simulator model
        Returns:
        the direction of molecule if it goes outside to inside then the value is 1 or -1 if it goes inside to outside

      • rebound

        public static void rebound(Molecule mol1,
                           sim.util.Double3D desiredLocation,
                           Molecule mol2,
                           sim.util.Double3D anotherLocation,
                           java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,Layer> layersMap,
                           CellSimulator3D_Model parent)
        Method to resolve one rebound between two molecules.
        Parameters:
        mol1 - the molecule to check collision
        desiredLocation - the desired location molecule one
        mol2 - another molecule to check collision
        anotherLocation - the position of sphere two
        layersMap - the map whit the ID of the layers and the layer agent
        parent - the cell simulator model
